mapper.sql: id, godtype,operater, sort, referrer,referrer_id, `type`, title, content,qrShow, real_views, rise_views, real_admire,rise_admire,total_admire,comment_count,start_id ,history_sort ,comment_time, create_time, member_id,locked,data_sources,audit_status,deleted
mapper.select:
select
distinct
id, sort, referrer,referrer_id, `type`, title,qrShow, real_views, rise_views, real_admire,rise_admire,total_admire,comment_count ,comment_time,godtype,content, create_time, member_id,locked,deleted from lhc_xs_recommend
and ( member_id in (select id from app_member where nickname like '%${findNickNameOrTitle}%') || referrer_id in (select id from lhc_xs_referrer where name like '%${findNickNameOrTitle}%') || title like '%${findNickNameOrTitle}%' )
and ( member_id in (select id from app_member where nickname like '%${findNickname}%') || referrer_id in (select id from lhc_xs_referrer where name like '%${findNickname}%') )
order by ${orderByClause}
limit #{offset} , #{limit}
